title: Write post-execution.md gate
description: Create the post-execution validation gate that verifies task completion: files modified check, notes check, time tracking check, parent completion check (auto-complete parent if all siblings finished), and error pattern check from catalog.
notes: Created post-execution.md gate with 5 checks: files modified check (WARNING), notes check (WARNING), time tracking check (INFO), parent auto-completion logic (AUTO), and error pattern check (INFO).
